name: ProcessWorkitemRequest

methods.name: getAction
methods.description: Returns the type of action already associated with the approval request. Valid values are: Approve, Reject, or Removed.

methods.name: getWorkitemId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the approval request that is in the process of being approved, rejected, or removed.

methods.name: setAction
methods.description: Sets the type of action to take for processing an approval request.

params.name: actionType
params.description: Valid values are: Approve, Reject, or Removed. Only system administrators can specify Removed.

methods.name: setWorkitemId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the approval request that is being approved, rejected, or removed.

description: Use the ProcessWorkitemRequest class for processing an approval request after it is submitted.
